summary: Six friends in a theatrical troupe dig up a corpse on an abandoned island to use in a mock Satanic rite. It backfires with deadly consequences.
cast: Alan Ormsby|Valerie Mamches|Jeff Gillen|Anya Ormsby|Paul Cronin|Jane Daly|Roy Engleman|Robert Philip|Bruce Solomon|Alecs Baird|Seth Sklarey|Bob Sherman|Curtis Bryant|William R. 'Bob' Smedley|Debbie Cummins|Gordon Gilbert|Peter Burke|Chester Phebus|Stuart Mitchell|Lee J. O'Donnell|Jack Sohmer|Sandra Laurie|Camille MacDonald|Brendan Kenny|Jean Clark|Al McAdams|Jane McAdams|Stephanie Solomon|Carl Richardson|Jerry Hoffer|Paula Hoffer|Andy Herbst|Trey Ward|Harry Boehme
keywords: hippie|bitten by evil dead|black mass|necrophilia|psychotronic film
title: La noche de los muertos
